articles.title: Referee named for Real Madrid-Manchester City clash in Champions League Semifinals - Managing Madrid
articles.description: Portuguese referee Artur Dias will be in charge.
articles.content: UEFA have appointed Portuguese referee Artur Dias as the man in charge of Tuesdays match between Real Madrid and Manchester City in the first leg of the Champions League Semifinals, which will kick-o… [+1019 chars]
